mainEntity.name: How much should I bet per round?

acceptedAnswer.text: Never more than 5% of your bankroll (1-3% is safer). If you have $100, max bet is $5. This gives you 20+ chances to recover from losses.

mainEntity.name: Can I make a profit playing crash?

acceptedAnswer.text: No. Crash has ~3% house edge. Long-term, you'll lose 3% of every bet. Short-term wins = variance (not skill). If you're profitable after 1,000+ rounds, then we can talk (but you won't be).

mainEntity.name: What's the biggest crash gambling mistake?

acceptedAnswer.text: Chasing losses (mistake #3). It turns small losses into catastrophes. Lose $50 → Bet $100 to win it back → Lose → Down $150 → Bet $200 → Lose → Down $350. In 3 rounds, you turned a 5% loss into a 35% loss.
